CustomField.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-008183
Determines if the account related to the lead is a new customer to Newmarket, existing customer adding a solution, or existing customer adding to an existing solution
CustomField.inlineHelpText: • Net New Customer: MQL Account does not currently use any Newmarket solutions • Existing Customer – New Solution: MQL Account is inquiring about another solution • Existing Customer – Existing Solution: MQL Account inquiring about additional solutions
CustomField.label: Type
